Brian writes down four integers $w > x > y > z$ whose sum is $44$. The pairwise positive differences of these numbers are $1,3,4,5,6,$ and $9$. What is the sum of the possible values for $w$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  16 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 31  \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 48  \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 62  \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  93 $
